summary: VEHICLE WILL NOT TRACK STRAIGHT. REQUIRES CONSTANT MINOR CORRECTION OR IT DRIFTS OUT OF LANE. IT'S LIKE A DEAD SPOT IN THE MIDDLE POSITION OF THE STEERING BOX. PER THE DEALER, THERE IS NO FIX AND THIS IS CONSISTENT FOR ALL NEW JL MODELS. THE 2018 WRANGLER JK MODELS DO NOT HAVE THE ISSUE. BOUGHT BRAND NEW A FEW WEEKS AGO. DEALER CONFIRMED BY DRIVING OTHER JL MODELS; SAME ISSUE.
